content: sts from the leg pm pick up and k14 16 18 20 22 along the right edge of the garter stitch heel flap k8 9 10 11 11 you should now be at the beginning of the round at the center of the heel flap 70 80 90 100 109 sts © 2023 stephen west all rights reserved pattern for personal use only questions support@westknits com 4 photography by westknits version 3 toe finishing if you want a contrast color toe then break your yarn and graft the remaining sts together using kitchener stitch use a new color for all of the toe instructions beginning with round 1 watch this westknits video to assist with the kitchener stitch technique round 1 k1 ssk k20 24 28 32 36 k2tog k1 pm k1 https //youtu be/lbfhqa4l66e ssk k20 24 28 32 36 k2tog k1 48 56 64 72 80 sts row 2 k all sts repeat all instructions for the second sock weave in ends and wet block the finished socks to smooth the fabric round 3 k1 ssk k to 3 sts before m k2tog k1 slm k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of round k2tog k1 4 sts decreased row 4 k all sts repeat last 2 rnds 5 6 7 8 9 more times 24 28 32 36 40 sts repeat round 3 only 3 3 4 4 5 more times 12 16 16 20 20 sts © 2023 stephen west all rights reserved pattern for personal use only questions support@westknits com 5 photography by westknits version 3
